{"id":1197253318,"question_id":3242,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1709869624,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1197253318/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Elements With Maximum Frequency","memory":"21.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxFrequencyElements(vector<int>& vc) {\n        int Max = 0;\n        int mp[101] = {0};\n        for(auto it : vc){\n            mp[it]++;\n            Max = max(Max, mp[it]);\n        }\n        int cnt = 0;\n        for(auto it : vc){\n            if(mp[it]==Max)\n            {\n                cnt += Max;\n                mp[it] = 0;\n            }\n        }\n        return cnt;\n\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-elements-with-maximum-frequency","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
